<a href="http://www.stat.purdue.edu/~mccabe/msr/">Mu Sigma Rho</a> is the national statistics honor society, and the Boston Chapter of the ASA oversees <a href="http://www.colby.edu/musigmarho/">nominations</a> from Smith each spring.


```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
archive <- read_csv(here::here("www", "Mu_Sigma_Rho_DB.csv"))
```

```{r mu-sigma-rho, fig.cap="Growth of Mu Sigma Rho inductees.", echo=FALSE}
archive %>%
  group_by(induction, class) %>%
  summarize(N = n()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = induction, y = N, fill = class)) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_y_continuous("Number of Inductees") + 
  scale_x_continuous("Year of Induction") + 
  labs(title = "Growth of Smith College Mu Sigma Rho inductees")
```

Search the archive to find inductees:

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
archive %>%
  arrange(desc(induction), Last, First) %>%
#  mutate(Name = paste(Last, First, "(", PrefFirst, ")")) %>%
  select(induction, Last, First, PrefFirst, class) %>%
  DT::datatable(options = list(pageLength = 25))
```
